name: Diablo 15 Year Anniversary Soundtrack CD
summary: To celebrate the 15th anniversary of the Diablo games, Blizzard Entertainment released this deluxe soundtrack to a very few fans, making it quite rare now. At a runtime of nearly 78 minutes, this album primarily consists of previously unreleased music from Diablo, Diablo II, and Diablo II: Lord of Destruction that will complete any Diablo fan's musical collection. As a bonus, also included are two Diablo III concept pieces that will not be present on the Diablo III game soundtrack. Join us on a darkly gothic journey into terror, corruption, and madness. Even in the darkest depths of the human heart, pray that a glimmer of hope remains. The end times draw near.
info:
• 中文名: 暗黑破坏神15周年原声碟
  • 版本特性: Limited Collector's Edition / Soundtrack
  • 发售日期: 2011
  • 价格: $29.95
  • 播放时长: 77 m
  • 录音: Blizzard Entertainment
  • 碟片数量: 1
  • 发行商: Blizzard Entertainment
